testcase.name: user can add an article

failure.message: Step "command add article selected" -- No link found with text: Lis채채 artikkeli For documentation on this error, please visit: http://seleniumhq.org/exceptions/no_such_element.html Build info: version: '2.13.0', revision: '14794', time: '2011-11-18 17:49:47' System info: os.name: 'Linux', os.arch: 'amd64', os.version: '3.2.0-39-generic', java.version: '1.7.0_15' Driver info: driver.version: HtmlUnitDriver; Step "information for the article to be added is entered" -- Unable to locate element with name: author For documentation on this error, please visit: http://seleniumhq.org/exceptions/no_such_element.html Build info: version: '2.13.0', revision: '14794', time: '2011-11-18 17:49:47' System info: os.name: 'Linux', os.arch: 'amd64', os.version: '3.2.0-39-generic', java.version: '1.7.0_15' Driver info: driver.version: HtmlUnitDriver; Step "information is added" -- expected true but was false

scenario user can add an article given command add article selected when information for the article to be added is entered then information is added
